app_descript:
G2G PASS

Brief: G2G PASS serves as an innovative travel management solution for individuals planning to transit through Western Australia. This intuitive mobile tool is endorsed by the Western Australia Police Force to streamline the travel exemption process, ensuring that travelers are authorized and in compliance with the regional road usage policies.
